pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Regression with Asymmetric Heavy-Tail Noise Distributions // Implementation of Robust Regression tailored to deal with Asymmetric noise Distribution, which was originally proposed by Takeuchi Bengio Kanamori (2002) doi:10.1162/08997660260293300. In addition, this implementation is extended as introducing potential feature regularization by LASSO etc.
